cosinnus.trans package¶

Submodules¶

cosinnus.trans.group module¶

cosinnus.trans.group.CosinnusConferenceTrans¶

alias of CosinnusConferenceTransBase

class cosinnus.trans.group.CosinnusConferenceTransBase¶

Bases: CosinnusProjectTransBase

A class containing all type-specific translation strings for the abstract typed CosinnusBaseGroup variations. Can be drop-in replaced per-portal with the setting COSINNUS_GROUP_TRANS_TYPED_CLASSES_DROPINS to vary the names of i.e. “Conferences” to “Expos”.

cosinnus.trans.group.CosinnusProjectTrans¶

alias of CosinnusProjectTransBase

class cosinnus.trans.group.CosinnusProjectTransBase¶

Bases: object

A class containing all type-specific translation strings for the abstract typed CosinnusBaseGroup variations. Can be drop-in replaced per-portal with the setting COSINNUS_GROUP_TRANS_TYPED_CLASSES_DROPINS to vary the names of i.e. “Conferences” to “Expos”. Always inherit at least the base class CosinnusProjectTransBase to make sure no class members are missing!

ACTIVATE = 'Activate Project'¶
ALL_LIST = 'All Projects'¶
BROWSE_ALL = 'Browse all Projects'¶
CALL_TO_JOIN = 'Collaborate!'¶
CALL_TO_REGISTER_AND_JOIN = 'Join now and collaborate!'¶
CONTACT_PERSON = 'Project administrator'¶
CONTACT_ROOM_GREETING_MESSAGE = 'You are now in a private channel with the admins of this project.'¶
CONTACT_ROOM_TOPIC = 'Request about your project "%(group_name)s"'¶

However, your data will still be retained.\n\n Please contact the administrators of this portal if you would like to irrevocably delete all of the content. Until then the project can be reactivated by your and any other project administrator.'¶

class cosinnus.trans.group.CosinnusSocietyTransBase¶
